text:
I have links to my Marketplace theme that are now broken because it looks like the word "theme" was added to the URL. Was this a mistake or could this be reverted back?

Before - 404
<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/industrial-pro-by-bootstrap-creative>
After - theme keyword added
<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/industrial-pro-theme-by-bootstrap-creative>
